snippet.title: Little Misfortune Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Available NOW on  PC - XBOX - PS4 - NINTENDO SWITCH!!!!! Links below 👑🌈

👑 STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/714120/Little_Misfortune/

👑 XBOX: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/little-misfortune/9mv7k6jqqwt9?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

👑 PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP5329-CUSA19165_00-0000000000000666

👑 NINTENDO SWITCH: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/little-misfortune-switch/


Misfortune Ramirez Hernandez, an imaginative 8-year-old, who seeks the prize of Eternal Happiness, as a gift to her Mommy. Led by her new friend, Mr. Voice, they venture into the woods, where mysteries are unraveled and a little bit of bad luck unfolds.

Little Misfortune is an interactive story, focused on exploration and characters, both sweet and dark, where your choices have consequences.

Sharing the same universe with the cult video game Fran Bow, created by the visionary dev-duo Killmonday Games.

https://www.littlemisfortune.com/
https://twitter.com/misfortunegame
https://www.facebook.com/littlemisfortunegame/

Voice talents Henrik Norman and Natalia Martinsson
Music by Isak J Martinsson
Art director Natalia Martinsson
Lead programmer Isak Martinsson
Artists Natalia Martinsson and Jessica Fransson
Programming by Isak Martinsson and Harald Wallin
Animation by Natalia Martinsson
Aditional Art and Animation Lillasyster Production Company 
Sound Design Henry Mikkonen
Sound and Music Mix and Mastering Johannes Ahlberg
Original story by Isak and Natalia Martinsson
Produced and directed by Killmonday Games

Subtitles by:
Russian: Olga Bikmullina
Spanish: Natalia Martinsson
Brazilian Portuquese: Fabiana Louza
German: Thomas Schneiders
French: Christophe Pallarés
Japanese: Maryna Murashka
